title: inbamayamAna pUrasNan
sahitya:
inbamayamAna pUraNan avan inda ulaginai sheidanan


anupallavi

  tunbam ingE vandadEnaDA adan tUrun pEdai manam tAnanDA


caraNam 1    niTTai puriyum kalaiyilE adai nILisai pADi magizhvuDan
kaTTi-tazhuvum nadiyilE nAn kANbadum kETpadum inbamE
    caraNam 2    kADu tiruttiDum kattiyaip-pirar kazhuttil azhuttinAn mAniDan
kUDi nalam sheyyum UrilE veDi guNDugaL pOTTavan mAniDan
    caraNam 3    sUriya vaTTamum inbamE kaDal sOpanam pADalum inbamE
kAr tannaip-peidu maraindiDum tyAgak-kATSiyum kANarum inbamE
    caraNam 4    sEyin mazhalaiyum inbamE vIra dhIrar kalaigaLum inbamE 
tAyin uLLanbilum inbamE yOga sAdhana vAzhvilum inbamE
